summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MoltBot Cybersecurity Defense System implementation. All 17 test cases passed successfully, verifying proper implementation of firewall, gateway protection, lockdown mode, dashboard handlers, server integration, and documentation.
passed_tests: Gateway protection source file exists at /app/src/security/gateway-protection.ts
Lockdown mode source file exists at /app/src/security/lockdown-mode.ts
Dashboard handlers source file exists at /app/src/security/integration/dashboard-handlers.ts
Gateway protection compiled file exists at /app/dist/security/gateway-protection.js
Lockdown mode compiled file exists at /app/dist/security/lockdown-mode.js
Dashboard handlers compiled file exists at /app/dist/security/integration/dashboard-handlers.js

Firewall exports all required functions: FIREWALL_CONFIG, isIpBlocked, blockIp, unblockIp, getBlockedIps, recordFailedAuth, checkApiRateLimit, checkLoginRateLimit, trackWsConnection, releaseWsConnection, validateHeaders, validatePayloadSize, validateUrlLength, detectAttackPatterns, logSecurityIncident, getSecurityLog, getSecurityStats
Gateway protection exports all required functions: GATEWAY_SECURITY_CONFIG, trackGatewayConnection, removeGatewayConnection, authenticateGateway, getActiveConnections, getGatewayStats
Lockdown mode exports all required functions: LOCKDOWN_CONFIG, getLockdownState, isLockdownActive, activateLockdown, deactivateLockdown, isAdminUser, checkLockdownAccess

Dashboard handlers exports all required handlers: securityDashboardHandlers with security.dashboard, security.blocked.list, security.blocked.add, security.blocked.remove, security.incidents.list, security.gateway.connections, security.lockdown.toggle, security.lockdown.status
Server methods imports and includes security handlers: securityDashboardHandlers properly imported and spread into coreGatewayHandlers

Server methods list includes all security methods: security.dashboard, security.blocked.list, security.blocked.add, security.blocked.remove, security.incidents.list, security.gateway.connections, security.lockdown.toggle, security.lockdown.status in BASE_METHODS
Env.example contains all required security variables: SECURITY_FIREWALL, RATE_LIMIT_API_PER_MINUTE, GATEWAY_PASSWORD, SECURITY_LOCKDOWN, SECURITY_ADMIN_EMAIL, KILL_SWITCH and more
DEPLOY_COOLIFY.md contains comprehensive security documentation: Security Configuration, Gateway Protection, Lockdown Mode, Kill Switch sections
